SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_id, filename, received, counted, rejected, validated, loaded, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, account_identifier, claimload_file_processed_id, file_type, sc_country_code FROM elp_claimload_file_processed WHERE claimload_file_processed_id = hextoraw(:claimload_file_processed_id)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_claimload_file_processed SET company_id = :company_id, filename = :filename, received = :received, counted = :counted, rejected = :rejected, validated = :validated, loaded = :loaded, account_identifier = :account_identifier, sc_country_code = :sc_country_code, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE claimload_file_processed_id = hextoraw(:claimload_file_processed_id)
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_claimload_file_processed ( company_id, filename, received, counted, rejected, validated, loaded, account_identifier, sc_country_code, created_by, claimload_file_processed_id ) VALUES ( :company_id, :filename, :received, :counted, :rejected, :validated, :loaded, :account_identifier, :sc_country_code :created_by, :claimload_file_processed_id )
SQL.DELETE: DELETE FROM elp_claimload_file_processed WHERE claimload_file_processed_id = hextoraw(:claimload_file_processed_id)
